title: Apple Expands Pricing for Apps
description: At a time of rising inflation, the company is introducing 600 options that could free developers from the days of charging 99 cents.

title: Oversight Board Criticizes Meta for Preferential Treatment
description: Influential and powerful users on Facebook and Instagram receive “unequal treatment,” an internal report said.

title: Computer Science Students Face a Shrinking Big Tech Job Market
description: A new reality is setting in for students and recent graduates who spent years honing themselves for careers at the largest tech companies.

title: Inside the Face-Off Between Russia and a Small Internet Access Firm
description: The cat-and-mouse experience of Proton, a Swiss company, shows what it’s like to be targeted by Russian censors — and what it takes to fight back.

title: Are You Applying for Tech Jobs or Internships? We Want to Hear About It.
description: Layoffs and hiring freezes at companies like Amazon and Meta are changing the job market for recent grads and college students. Tell us about your experiences.

title: Are You Applying for Tech Jobs or Internships? We Want to Hear About It.
description: Layoffs and hiring freezes at companies like Amazon and Meta are changing the job market for recent grads and college students. Tell us about your experiences.

title: Final Fantasy Reunion Review: Reboot Is a Much Better Game
description: The new Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII Reunion was overhauled in graphics and gameplay, making it much better than the original.

title: In Phoenix, a Taiwanese Chip Giant Builds a Hedge Against China
description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, the world’s biggest maker of advanced computer chips, plans to unveil an ambitious factory upgrade in Arizona.
